title: Moist and delicious chocolate cake
ingredients: ['220g plain flour, sifted', '400g caster or granulated sugar', '60g unsweetened cocoa powder, sifted', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teasoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '230ml buttermilk (see tip)', '120ml flavourless oil (e.g. vegetable, sunflower oil)', '2 large eggs', '1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract or paste', '230ml freshly brewed coffee']
